ReLTER 1.0.0
    • Reference
    • Changelog

    Reference

    All functions

    get_site_info()

    Return a tibble object containing information, as a stored in DEIMS-SDR catalogue, of a single eLTER site.

    get_site_ODS()

    Download and return a SpatRaster object containing requested by ODS dataset, cropped to a eLTER site boundaries.

    get_network_envcharacts()

    Return a tibble object containing Environmental Characteristics, stored in DEIMS-SDR catalogue, of all the eLTER sites belonging to an eLTER Network (e.g. LTER Italy network).

    get_network_parameters()

    Return a tibble object containing Environmental Parameters collected by all of the eLTER sites belonging to an eLTER Network (e.g. LTER Italy network), as a stored into DEIMS-SDR.

    get_network_research_topics()

    Return a tibble object containing Research Topics collected by all of the eLTER sites belonging to an eLTER Network (e.g. LTER Italy network), as a stored into DEIMS-SDR.

    get_network_related_resources()

    Return a tibble object containing Related Resources, as a stored in DEIMS-SDR catalogue, of all the eLTER sites belonging to an eLTER Network (e.g. LTER Italy network).

    get_network_sites()

    Return a spatial point vector object containing name and geo-information, stored in DEIMS-SDR catalogue, of all the eLTER sites belonging to an eLTER Network (e.g. LTER Italy network).

    get_ilter_envcharacts()

    Return a tibble object containing Environmental Characteristics collected by all of the eLTER sites (more than 1200 sites), as a stored into DEIMS-SDR, belonging to International LTER network (ILTER).

    get_ilter_generalinfo()

    Return a spatial point vector object containing name and geo-information, stored in DEIMS-SDR catalogue, of all the eLTER sites (more than 1200 sites) belonging to International LTER network (ILTER).

    get_ilter_parameters()

    Return a tibble object containing Parameter collected by all of the eLTER sites (more than 1200 sites), as a stored into DEIMS-SDR, belonging to International LTER network (ILTER).

    get_ilter_research_topics()

    Return a tibble object containing Research Topics collected by all of the eLTER sites (more than 1200 sites), as a stored into DEIMS-SDR, belonging to International LTER network (ILTER).

    get_activity_info()

    Return a tibble object containing information, as a stored in DEIMS-SDR catalogue, about a single eLTER activity (e.g. https://deims.org/activity/8786fc6d-5d70-495c-b901-42f480182845).

    get_dataset_info()

    Return a tibble object containing information, as a stored in DEIMS-SDR catalogue, about a single eLTER dataset (e.g. https://deims.org/dataset/38d604ef-decb-4d67-8ac3-cc843d10d3ef).

    produce_network_points_map()

    Return a image map object of all of the eLTER sites belonging to an eLTER Network (e.g. LTER Italy network), as a stored into DEIMS-SDR.

    produce_site_map()

    Return a image map object of a single eLTER site boundaries, as a stored in DEIMS-SDR catalogue.

    produce_site_qrcode()

    Return a QR code image of any provided DEIMS.iD (e.g. dataset, site, activity).

    produce_site_parameters_pie()

    Return a pie chart of Environmental Parameters, as a stored in DEIMS-SDR catalogue, of a single eLTER site or all of the eLTER sites belonging to an eLTER Network (e.g. LTER Italy network).

    produce_site_parameters_waffle()

    Return a waffle chart of Environmental Parameters, as a stored in DEIMS-SDR catalogue, of a single eLTER site or all of the eLTER sites belonging to an eLTER Network (e.g. LTER Italy network).

    get_sos_procedurelist()

    Return a list of Procedure (e.g. Method, algorithm, instrument, sensor, or system of these which may be used in making an observation) store into a SOS (Sensor Observations Service OGC).

    taxon_id_pesi()

    Return tibble object with all the columns of input table plus new columns such as 'canonicalName', 'authorship', synonyms', 'LSID', 'url', 'accordingTo', 'checkStatus' gathered from PESI RestAPI.

    taxon_id_worms()

    Return tibble object with all the columns of input table plus new columns such as valid_name, valid_authority, valid_AphiaID, status, synonyms, LSID, url, matchType, nOfWormsRecords, wormsRecords obtained by Worms rest API.

    Contents

    Developed by Alessandro Oggioni, Micha Silver, Paolo Tagliolato, Luigi Ranghetti.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.1.
